attributes.action: We should have an All Party Coalition
attributes.additional_details:
Britain faces the greatest financial crisis in its history.

The election gave all three major parties a similar share of the vote.

The Tories selected to form a coalition with the LibDems who had the least seats.

Bearing in mind the severe risks of the current financial crisis and the possible subsequent consequences - shouldn't there be an all party coalition to see the nation through?
